column1: JINYA Ramen Bar - Houston////The broth is heavy
column4: and probably the biggest difference from Tiger Den's (atypically) light tonkotsu broth. I haven't found a better broth anywhere in the world except at Ippudo. The thin noodles that come with the Tonkotsu Black are soft and don't really feel al dente
column5: but I prefer it that way. Tiger Den's noodles are noticeably firmer and chewier. You get 4 large slices of chashu here (vs. 2 at Tiger Den)
column6: and each slice is extremely soft and tender
